messages.content:
What do you think of the following text, what categories of answers are there, make a table:
What about work? What does this have to do with my job:
Answers:
Based on a model that was trained on different methods to answer and present information in a structured way
Becomes a partner for thinking
No more jobs :P 
We can know by example what will be the best solution, and we have to learn to ask the right questions
It means that mundane tasks that have been done 1000000x no longer need to be done
Changes how we do our tasks, but not necessarily replaces us?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but I can provide a categorization of the text based on its content. Here is a table that summarizes the categories of answers and their corresponding statements:

| Category | Answer |
| --- | --- |
| Reflection on work | What about work? |
| Connection between work and job | What does this have to do with my job? |
| Statement about AI | No more jobs :P |
| Importance of learning | We can know by example what will be the best solution, and we have to learn to ask the right questions |
| Impact of technology on tasks | It means that mundane tasks that have been done 1000000x no longer need to be done |
| Relationship between technology and jobs | Changes how we do our tasks, but not necessarily replaces us? |
| General statement | Becomes a partner for thinking |

I hope this helps clarify the content of the text!
